00089 typedef unsigned char           Bool; 
00090 typedef signed char             S8 ;  
00091 typedef unsigned char           U8 ;  
00092 typedef signed short int        S16;  
00093 typedef unsigned short int      U16;  
00094 typedef signed long int         S32;  
00095 typedef unsigned long int       U32;  
00096 typedef signed long long int    S64;  
00097 typedef unsigned long long int  U64;  
00098 typedef float                   F32;  
00099 typedef double                  F64;

00116 typedef union
00117 {
00118   S16 s16   ;
00119   U16 u16   ;
00120   S8  s8 [2];
00121   U8  u8 [2];
00122 } Union16;
00123 
00125 typedef union
00126 {
00127   S32 s32   ;
00128   U32 u32   ;
00129   S16 s16[2];
00130   U16 u16[2];
00131   S8  s8 [4];
00132   U8  u8 [4];
00133 } Union32;
00134 
00136 typedef union
00137 {
00138   S64 s64   ;
00139   U64 u64   ;
00140   S32 s32[2];
00141   U32 u32[2];
00142   S16 s16[4];
00143   U16 u16[4];
00144   S8  s8 [8];
00145   U8  u8 [8];
00146 } Union64;
00147 
00149 typedef union
00150 {
00151   S64 *s64ptr;
00152   U64 *u64ptr;
00153   S32 *s32ptr;
00154   U32 *u32ptr;
00155   S16 *s16ptr;
00156   U16 *u16ptr;
00157   S8  *s8ptr ;
00158   U8  *u8ptr ;
00159 } UnionPtr;
00160 
00162 typedef union
00163 {
00164   volatile S64 *s64ptr;
00165   volatile U64 *u64ptr;
00166   volatile S32 *s32ptr;
00167   volatile U32 *u32ptr;
00168   volatile S16 *s16ptr;
00169   volatile U16 *u16ptr;
00170   volatile S8  *s8ptr ;
00171   volatile U8  *u8ptr ;
00172 } UnionVPtr;
00173 
00175 typedef union
00176 {
00177   const S64 *s64ptr;
00178   const U64 *u64ptr;
00179   const S32 *s32ptr;
00180   const U32 *u32ptr;
00181   const S16 *s16ptr;
00182   const U16 *u16ptr;
00183   const S8  *s8ptr ;
00184   const U8  *u8ptr ;
00185 } UnionCPtr;
00186 
00188 typedef union
00189 {
00190   const volatile S64 *s64ptr;
00191   const volatile U64 *u64ptr;
00192   const volatile S32 *s32ptr;
00193   const volatile U32 *u32ptr;
00194   const volatile S16 *s16ptr;
00195   const volatile U16 *u16ptr;
00196   const volatile S8  *s8ptr ;
00197   const volatile U8  *u8ptr ;
00198 } UnionCVPtr;
00199 
00201 typedef struct
00202 {
00203   S64 *s64ptr;
00204   U64 *u64ptr;
00205   S32 *s32ptr;
00206   U32 *u32ptr;
00207   S16 *s16ptr;
00208   U16 *u16ptr;
00209   S8  *s8ptr ;
00210   U8  *u8ptr ;
00211 } StructPtr;
00212 
00214 typedef struct
00215 {
00216   volatile S64 *s64ptr;
00217   volatile U64 *u64ptr;
00218   volatile S32 *s32ptr;
00219   volatile U32 *u32ptr;
00220   volatile S16 *s16ptr;
00221   volatile U16 *u16ptr;
00222   volatile S8  *s8ptr ;
00223   volatile U8  *u8ptr ;
00224 } StructVPtr;

00227 typedef struct
00228 {
00229   const S64 *s64ptr;
00230   const U64 *u64ptr;
00231   const S32 *s32ptr;
00232   const U32 *u32ptr;
00233   const S16 *s16ptr;
00234   const U16 *u16ptr;
00235   const S8  *s8ptr ;
00236   const U8  *u8ptr ;
00237 } StructCPtr;

00241 {
00242   const volatile S64 *s64ptr;
00243   const volatile U64 *u64ptr;
00244   const volatile S32 *s32ptr;
00245   const volatile U32 *u32ptr;
00246   const volatile S16 *s16ptr;
00247   const volatile U16 *u16ptr;

00249   const volatile U8  *u8ptr ;

00262 #define DISABLE   0
00263 #define ENABLE    1
00264 #define DISABLED  0
00265 #define ENABLED   1
00266 #define OFF       0
00267 #define ON        1
00268 #define FALSE     0
00269 #define TRUE      1
00270 #define KO        0
00271 #define OK        1
00272 #define PASS      0
00273 #define FAIL      1
00274 #define LOW       0
00275 #define HIGH      1

00285

00294 #define Rd_bits( value, mask)        ((value) & (mask))
00295 
00304 #define Wr_bits(lvalue, mask, bits)  ((lvalue) = ((lvalue) & ~(mask)) |\
00305                                                  ((bits  ) &  (mask)))
00306 
00314 #define Tst_bits( value, mask)  (Rd_bits(value, mask) != 0)
00315 
00323 #define Clr_bits(lvalue, mask)  ((lvalue) &= ~(mask))
00324 
00332 #define Set_bits(lvalue, mask)  ((lvalue) |=  (mask))
00333 
00341 #define Tgl_bits(lvalue, mask)  ((lvalue) ^=  (mask))
00342 
00350 #define Rd_bitfield( value, mask)           (Rd_bits( value, mask) >> ctz(mask))
00351 
00360 #define Wr_bitfield(lvalue, mask, bitfield) (Wr_bits(lvalue, mask, (U32)(bitfield) << ctz(mask)))

00376   }

00378   #define Assert(expr)

00402 #if __GNUC__
00403   #define clz(u)              __builtin_clz(u)
00404 #elif __ICCAVR32__
00405   #define clz(u)              __count_leading_zeros(u)
00406 #endif
00407 
00414 #if __GNUC__
00415   #define ctz(u)              __builtin_ctz(u)
00416 #elif __ICCAVR32__
00417   #define ctz(u)              __count_trailing_zeros(u)
00418 #endif

00433 #define bit_reverse8(u8)    ((U8)(bit_reverse32((U8)(u8)) >> 24))
00434 
00441 #define bit_reverse16(u16)  ((U16)(bit_reverse32((U16)(u16)) >> 16))
00442 
00449 #if __GNUC__
00450   #define bit_reverse32(u32) \
00451   (\
00452     {\
00453       unsigned int __value = (U32)(u32);\
00454       __asm__ ("brev\t%0" : "+r" (__value) :  : "cc");\
00455       (U32)__value;\
00456     }\
00457   )
00458 #elif __ICCAVR32__
00459   #define bit_reverse32(u32)  ((U32)__bit_reverse((U32)(u32)))
00460 #endif
00461 
00468 #define bit_reverse64(u64)  ((U64)(((U64)bit_reverse32((U64)(u64) >> 32)) |\
00469                                    ((U64)bit_reverse32((U64)(u64)) << 32)))

00485 #define Test_align(val, n     ) (!Tst_bits( val, (n) - 1     )   )
00486 
00494 #define Get_align( val, n     ) (  Rd_bits( val, (n) - 1     )   )
00495 
00504 #define Set_align(lval, n, alg) (  Wr_bits(lval, (n) - 1, alg)   )
00505 
00513 #define Align_up(  val, n     ) (((val) + ((n) - 1)) & ~((n) - 1))
00514 
00522 #define Align_down(val, n     ) ( (val)              & ~((n) - 1))

00548 #define Abs(a)              (((a) <  0 ) ? -(a) : (a))
00549 
00559 #define Min(a, b)           (((a) < (b)) ?  (a) : (b))
00560 
00570 #define Max(a, b)           (((a) > (b)) ?  (a) : (b))
00571 
00580 #if __GNUC__
00581   #define abs(a) \
00582   (\
00583     {\
00584       int __value = (a);\
00585       __asm__ ("abs\t%0" : "+r" (__value) :  : "cc");\
00586       __value;\
00587     }\
00588   )
00589 #elif __ICCAVR32__
00590   #define abs(a)      Abs(a)
00591 #endif
00592 
00602 #if __GNUC__
00603   #define min(a, b) \
00604   (\
00605     {\
00606       int __value, __arg_a = (a), __arg_b = (b);\
00607       __asm__ ("min\t%0, %1, %2" : "=r" (__value) : "r" (__arg_a), "r" (__arg_b));\
00608       __value;\
00609     }\
00610   )
00611 #elif __ICCAVR32__
00612   #define min(a, b)   __min(a, b)
00613 #endif
00614 
00624 #if __GNUC__
00625   #define max(a, b) \
00626   (\
00627     {\
00628       int __value, __arg_a = (a), __arg_b = (b);\
00629       __asm__ ("max\t%0, %1, %2" : "=r" (__value) : "r" (__arg_a), "r" (__arg_b));\
00630       __value;\
00631     }\
00632   )
00633 #elif __ICCAVR32__
00634   #define max(a, b)   __max(a, b)
00635 #endif

00651 #define Long_call(addr)                   ((*(void (*)(void))(addr))())
00652 
00657 #if __GNUC__
00658   #define Reset_CPU() \
00659   (\
00660     {\
00661       __asm__ __volatile__ (\
00662         "lddpc   r9, 3f\n\t"\
00663         "mfsr    r8, %[SR]\n\t"\
00664         "bfextu  r8, r8, %[SR_M_OFFSET], %[SR_M_SIZE]\n\t"\
00665         "cp.w    r8, 0b001\n\t"\
00666         "breq    0f\n\t"\
00667         "sub     r8, pc, $ - 1f\n\t"\
00668         "pushm   r8-r9\n\t"\
00669         "rete\n"\
00670         "0:\n\t"\
00671         "mtsr    %[SR], r9\n"\
00672         "1:\n\t"\
00673         "mov     r0, 0\n\t"\
00674         "mov     r1, 0\n\t"\
00675         "mov     r2, 0\n\t"\
00676         "mov     r3, 0\n\t"\
00677         "mov     r4, 0\n\t"\
00678         "mov     r5, 0\n\t"\
00679         "mov     r6, 0\n\t"\
00680         "mov     r7, 0\n\t"\
00681         "mov     r8, 0\n\t"\
00682         "mov     r9, 0\n\t"\
00683         "mov     r10, 0\n\t"\
00684         "mov     r11, 0\n\t"\
00685         "mov     r12, 0\n\t"\
00686         "mov     sp, 0\n\t"\
00687         "stdsp   sp[0], sp\n\t"\
00688         "ldmts   sp, sp\n\t"\
00689         "mov     lr, 0\n\t"\
00690         "lddpc   pc, 2f\n\t"\
00691         ".balign 4\n"\
00692         "2:\n\t"\
00693         ".word   _start\n"\
00694         "3:\n\t"\
00695         ".word   %[RESET_SR]"\
00696         :\
00697         : [SR] "i" (AVR32_SR),\
00698           [SR_M_OFFSET] "i" (AVR32_SR_M_OFFSET),\
00699           [SR_M_SIZE] "i" (AVR32_SR_M_SIZE),\
00700           [RESET_SR] "i" (AVR32_SR_GM_MASK | AVR32_SR_EM_MASK | (AVR32_SR_M_SUP << AVR32_SR_M_OFFSET))\
00701       );\
00702     }\
00703   )
00704 #elif __ICCAVR32__
00705   #define Reset_CPU() \
00706   {\
00707     extern void *volatile __program_start;\
00708     __asm__ __volatile__ (\
00709       "mov     r7, LWRD(__program_start)\n\t"\
00710       "orh     r7, HWRD(__program_start)\n\t"\
00711       "mov     r9, LWRD("ASTRINGZ(AVR32_SR_GM_MASK | AVR32_SR_EM_MASK | (AVR32_SR_M_SUP << AVR32_SR_M_OFFSET))")\n\t"\
00712       "orh     r9, HWRD("ASTRINGZ(AVR32_SR_GM_MASK | AVR32_SR_EM_MASK | (AVR32_SR_M_SUP << AVR32_SR_M_OFFSET))")\n\t"\
00713       "mfsr    r8, "ASTRINGZ(AVR32_SR)"\n\t"\
00714       "bfextu  r8, r8, "ASTRINGZ(AVR32_SR_M_OFFSET)", "ASTRINGZ(AVR32_SR_M_SIZE)"\n\t"\
00715       "cp.w    r8, 001b\n\t"\
00716       "breq    $ + 10\n\t"\
00717       "sub     r8, pc, -12\n\t"\
00718       "pushm   r8-r9\n\t"\
00719       "rete\n\t"\
00720       "mtsr    "ASTRINGZ(AVR32_SR)", r9\n\t"\
00721       "mov     r0, 0\n\t"\
00722       "mov     r1, 0\n\t"\
00723       "mov     r2, 0\n\t"\
00724       "mov     r3, 0\n\t"\
00725       "mov     r4, 0\n\t"\
00726       "mov     r5, 0\n\t"\
00727       "mov     r6, 0\n\t"\
00728       "st.w    r0[4], r7\n\t"\
00729       "mov     r7, 0\n\t"\
00730       "mov     r8, 0\n\t"\
00731       "mov     r9, 0\n\t"\
00732       "mov     r10, 0\n\t"\
00733       "mov     r11, 0\n\t"\
00734       "mov     r12, 0\n\t"\
00735       "mov     sp, 0\n\t"\
00736       "stdsp   sp[0], sp\n\t"\
00737       "ldmts   sp, sp\n\t"\
00738       "mov     lr, 0\n\t"\
00739       "ld.w    pc, lr[4]"\
00740     );\
00741     __program_start;\
00742   }
00743 #endif

00784 #define Is_global_exception_enabled()       (!Tst_bits(Get_system_register(AVR32_SR), AVR32_SR_EM_MASK))
00785 
00788 #if __GNUC__
00789   #define Disable_global_exception()        ({__asm__ __volatile__ ("ssrf\t%0" :  : "i" (AVR32_SR_EM_OFFSET));})
00790 #elif __ICCAVR32__
00791   #define Disable_global_exception()        (__set_status_flag(AVR32_SR_EM_OFFSET))
00792 #endif
00793 
00796 #if __GNUC__
00797   #define Enable_global_exception()         ({__asm__ __volatile__ ("csrf\t%0" :  : "i" (AVR32_SR_EM_OFFSET));})
00798 #elif __ICCAVR32__
00799   #define Enable_global_exception()         (__clear_status_flag(AVR32_SR_EM_OFFSET))
00800 #endif
00801 
00806 #define Is_global_interrupt_enabled()       (!Tst_bits(Get_system_register(AVR32_SR), AVR32_SR_GM_MASK))
00807 
00810 #if __GNUC__
00811   #define Disable_global_interrupt()        ({__asm__ __volatile__ ("ssrf\t%0" :  : "i" (AVR32_SR_GM_OFFSET));})
00812 #elif __ICCAVR32__
00813   #define Disable_global_interrupt()        (__disable_interrupt())
00814 #endif
00815 
00818 #if __GNUC__
00819   #define Enable_global_interrupt()         ({__asm__ __volatile__ ("csrf\t%0" :  : "i" (AVR32_SR_GM_OFFSET));})
00820 #elif __ICCAVR32__
00821   #define Enable_global_interrupt()         (__enable_interrupt())
00822 #endif
00823 
00830 #define Is_interrupt_level_enabled(int_lev) (!Tst_bits(Get_system_register(AVR32_SR), TPASTE3(AVR32_SR_I, int_lev, M_MASK)))
00831 
00836 #if __GNUC__
00837   #define Disable_interrupt_level(int_lev)  ({__asm__ __volatile__ ("ssrf\t%0" :  : "i" (TPASTE3(AVR32_SR_I, int_lev, M_OFFSET)));})
00838 #elif __ICCAVR32__
00839   #define Disable_interrupt_level(int_lev)  (__set_status_flag(TPASTE3(AVR32_SR_I, int_lev, M_OFFSET)))
00840 #endif
00841 
00846 #if __GNUC__
00847   #define Enable_interrupt_level(int_lev)   ({__asm__ __volatile__ ("csrf\t%0" :  : "i" (TPASTE3(AVR32_SR_I, int_lev, M_OFFSET)));})
00848 #elif __ICCAVR32__
00849   #define Enable_interrupt_level(int_lev)   (__clear_status_flag(TPASTE3(AVR32_SR_I, int_lev, M_OFFSET)))
00850 #endif

00892 // Check that MCU endianism is correctly defined.
00893 #ifndef LITTLE_ENDIAN_MCU
00894   #error YOU MUST define the MCU endianism with LITTLE_ENDIAN_MCU: either FALSE or TRUE
00895 #endif
00896 
00898 #define BIG_ENDIAN_MCU        (!LITTLE_ENDIAN_MCU)

00908 
00909   #define LSB(u16)        (((U8  *)&(u16))[0])  
00910   #define MSB(u16)        (((U8  *)&(u16))[1])  
00911 
00912   #define LSH(u32)        (((U16 *)&(u32))[0])  
00913   #define MSH(u32)        (((U16 *)&(u32))[1])  
00914   #define LSB0W(u32)      (((U8  *)&(u32))[0])  
00915   #define LSB1W(u32)      (((U8  *)&(u32))[1])  
00916   #define LSB2W(u32)      (((U8  *)&(u32))[2])  
00917   #define LSB3W(u32)      (((U8  *)&(u32))[3])  
00918   #define MSB3W(u32)      LSB0W(u32)            
00919   #define MSB2W(u32)      LSB1W(u32)            
00920   #define MSB1W(u32)      LSB2W(u32)            
00921   #define MSB0W(u32)      LSB3W(u32)            
00922 
00923   #define LSW(u64)        (((U32 *)&(u64))[0])  
00924   #define MSW(u64)        (((U32 *)&(u64))[1])  
00925   #define LSH0(u64)       (((U16 *)&(u64))[0])  
00926   #define LSH1(u64)       (((U16 *)&(u64))[1])  
00927   #define LSH2(u64)       (((U16 *)&(u64))[2])  
00928   #define LSH3(u64)       (((U16 *)&(u64))[3])  
00929   #define MSH3(u64)       LSH0(u64)             
00930   #define MSH2(u64)       LSH1(u64)             
00931   #define MSH1(u64)       LSH2(u64)             
00932   #define MSH0(u64)       LSH3(u64)             
00933   #define LSB0D(u64)      (((U8  *)&(u64))[0])  
00934   #define LSB1D(u64)      (((U8  *)&(u64))[1])  
00935   #define LSB2D(u64)      (((U8  *)&(u64))[2])

01018 #define Swap16(u16) ((U16)(((U16)(u16) >> 8) |\
01019                            ((U16)(u16) << 8)))
01020 
01029 #define Swap32(u32) ((U32)(((U32)Swap16((U32)(u32) >> 16)) |\
01030                            ((U32)Swap16((U32)(u32)) << 16)))
01031 
01040 #define Swap64(u64) ((U64)(((U64)Swap32((U64)(u64) >> 32)) |\
01041                            ((U64)Swap32((U64)(u64)) << 32)))
01042 
01051 #if __GNUC__
01052   #define swap16(u16) ((U16)__builtin_bswap_16((U16)(u16)))
01053 #elif __ICCAVR32__
01054   #define swap16(u16) ((U16)__swap_bytes_in_halfwords((U16)(u16)))
01055 #endif
01056 
01065 #if __GNUC__
01066   #define swap32(u32) ((U32)__builtin_bswap_32((U32)(u32)))
01067 #elif __ICCAVR32__
01068   #define swap32(u32) ((U32)__swap_bytes((U32)(u32)))
01069 #endif

01079 #define swap64(u64) ((U64)(((U64)swap32((U64)(u64) >> 32)) |\
01080                            ((U64)swap32((U64)(u64)) << 32)))
